name: linsys-v

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: LINSYS_V: Verified Solution of Linear Systems

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description:
NVPL BLAS (NVIDIA Performance Libraries BLAS) is part of NVIDIA
Performance Libraries that provides standard Fortran 77 BLAS APIs as
well as C (CBLAS).

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description: A BLAS and LAPACK wrapper library with runtime exchangable backends

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Cray's MPICH is a high performance and widely portable implementation of
the Message Passing Interface (MPI) standard.

dependencies.name: scalapack
dependencies.description:
ScaLAPACK is a library of high-performance linear algebra routines for
parallel distributed memory machines
